\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}

\node at (1,3) {$\times$};
\node[text=blue,right] at (1,3) {node text};
\node[text=red,below] at (1,3) {below};
\draw (0,1.6) --node{edge text} +(3,1);
\draw (0,1) --node[sloped,below]{sloped text} +(3,1);

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
